description:
Use Coupon Code: FAST50 for a 50% discount

Why have faster websites

Nobody likes slow websites.

83% of users expects sites to load within 3 seconds

Users care about performance

Faster websites make more money !

1 second improvement = 7% increase in conversions


What's in the course?

Making sites run faster, Lowering load time & Improved

site performance by 80-100%


Will I be able to do it myself?

100%. The course has video lectures with step-by-step easy to

follow instructions. All demonstrations are on a LIVE site.

See the difference yourself !


Any pre-requisite knowledge required?

Yes. But no rocket science knowledge required. Anybody with

a very basic know-how about websites can do it. No coding

experience needed.


What if i don't get any advantages?

Full course fee refund if requested within 30 days.

No questions asked.
title: Web Performance Optimization - Run websites faster !
